alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ellis and northwestern Roger Mills Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Higgins, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Ellis and northwestern Roger Mills Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
